partsBinMetaInfo.comment: A simple control morph for sharing and synchronizing a set of morphs. This relies on the SyncServer and is still an early prototype.

partsBinMetaInfo/changes/10.author: undefined
partsBinMetaInfo/changes/10.message: suddenly, the rectangle became a CarDemo

partsBinMetaInfo/changes/14.author: cschuster
partsBinMetaInfo/changes/14.message: changed toggle colors and connecting behavior

submorphs/0/partsBinMetaInfo.comment: Has a script that is called on button press

submorphs/2/partsBinMetaInfo/changes/1.author: undefined
submorphs/2/partsBinMetaInfo/changes/1.message: Set the inset as: this.setPadding(Rectangle.inset(4,2)).  This gives it a more pleasing appearance with a border, and also makes it easier to select near the bounds.

submorphs/2/partsBinMetaInfo/changes/2.author: tessi
submorphs/2/partsBinMetaInfo/changes/2.message: TextBubble calls its disappear() function after showBubbleTime() milliseconds now

submorphs/2/partsBinMetaInfo/changes/3.author: tessi
submorphs/2/partsBinMetaInfo/changes/3.message: TextBubble calls its disappear() function after showBubbleTime() milliseconds now
